name: Borea
description: Beneath you is the fortified ice of Borea amid four towering mountains in its Four corners and fencèd by the crenellated saddle-slopes between. At the center of Borea is the North Pole, the Red candy-stripèd citadel of mad Magus Borealis. At the base of the southern slopes, the ice crumbles into the Boreal Sea, the only safe port to or from Borea.
